between?(min, max).description:
Returns false if obj <=> min is less
than zero or if obj <=> max is greater
than zero, true otherwise.

clamp(min, max).description:
In (min, max) form, returns min
if obj <=> min is less than zero, max if obj
<=> max is greater than zero, and obj otherwise.

clamp(range).description:
In (range) form, returns range.begin if obj
<=> range.begin is less than zero, range.end
if obj <=> range.end is greater than zero, and obj otherwise.
